table.name: vtiger_custpurchase
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_custpurchase` ( `custpurchaseid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `purchaseordername` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `custpostatus` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`custpurchaseid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_custpurchasecf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_custpurchasecf` ( `custpurchaseid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`custpurchaseid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
